about_the_game:
This is a Three Kingdoms strategy role-playing game where players can take on the role of any general that appears in the game, embarking on an interesting journey through the Three Kingdoms period.The game focuses on the process of cultivating generals, with a rich set of adventure exploration events and interactive events between generals.

You can choose to start the game as a feudal lord or, like the Sleeping Dragon, work the land in Nanyang and rise to prominence after being recognized by a lord!When playing as a governor, you can help your lord conquer cities and unify the realm, or, like Sima Zhongda, raise a private army and stage a rebellion.The evaluation of a general is no longer a numerical value but a rating that grows as the game progresses: S, A, B, C, D.

Although this may not fully reproduce the shock brought by the scene of Guan Yu, a novice archer, cutting down the fierce general Hua Xiong while warming wine, it can still bring similar fun.For example, Zhang Liao, rated A in martial prowess, challenges Xu Huang, also rated A (or even S), to a duel. Should he accept?After all, in the real Three Kingdoms world, no one has a label of five-dimensional data on their head. Judgments are made based on the evaluations of the people.It is precisely because of the uncertainty of this evaluation that Zhuge Liang became famous for burning Xinye, and the veteran Liu Bei was defeated by the newly emerged scholar Lu Xun... and so on.

Different generals have unique types of troops.For example, Gongsun Zan's White Horse Guards have long blocked the Xiongnu cavalry, and in the Romance of the Three Kingdoms, the Nanman's rattan-armored soldiers are not as effective against swords and spears, etc.Even if a general's attributes are not outstanding, with the advantage of troop types and legions, they can sweep the world.The types of troops that appear in the game cover the top troops that appeared in the Romance of the Three Kingdoms, such as the Tiger and Cheetah Riders, the Great Halberd Soldiers, and the White Horse Guards.The strength of the general and the difference in troop types can affect the combat power of an army.Even the combat power of the army is related to the number of troops, after all, using superior troops to surround can intimidate a small number of enemies...But the Battle of Red Cliffs tells us that the charm of the Three Kingdoms lies precisely in the people, those shining generals.Therefore, a rich skill system has been designed to make outstanding generals stand out.Such as fire attack, confusion, and other tactics in the battle, as well as unique combat skills like "Unmatched" and "Strive," and internal affairs skills like "Commerce Talent" and "Agriculture," as well as other skills like "Famous Scholar," "Divination," and "Escape."In the battle system, troop status such as burning and confusion is also set, which can greatly enhance the playability of turn-based combat.As for why it is turn-based? The bearded planning uncle said two words, the battle, the defending side can choose to huddle inside the city wall to gain the defense bonus of the Iron Wall status until the city wall is broken!Or if the enemy's food is very little before the battle, you can use the defense skill to drag on until the enemy has no food and automatically win the victory!

After talking about the complex battle system, the following internal politics system is actually simplified.The planning uncle said that he really doesn't like the complex internal politics operation of clicking, clicking, clicking.Simply based on the number and attributes of the generals in the city, as well as the population base of the city, to determine the development of the city and the growth of money and food.But in the game, you can't see the loyalty of the generals.The planning uncle said again, in the eyes of the lord, every general should be a loyal minister, until a general defected to the the game, you can chat with generals who have high friendship with the protagonist, and they will mention that a certain general will have a different heart.Or sometimes when you meet generals on the big map, they will casually say, but it's not necessarily accurate...At present, there are no historical events set in the game, because the strategy simulation RPG game itself is another "wild history," which is the Three Kingdoms history created by the players themselves.Players who play the Battle of Red Cliffs script and did not choose Cao Cao don't have to worry, maybe in a few years, there will be a self-reliant governor in the internal Cao Wei...As for the selection of the governor of the own side's power, the monarch cannot directly designate it.Instead, the system automatically selects the capable from the generals with high achievements.So playing as a monarch, you need to observe the situation of the governors in each city at any time. If a general with low friendship value becomes the governor, you have to hurry up and reward or give treasures.Each general has his own preferences and concepts, the so-called Tao is different and not to be discussed.The game tries to close to the romance, and it is more difficult to log in generals with different Tao.These generals may reduce loyalty every turn, and if they are appointed as governors, it will be more troublesome.Friends who are not familiar with the Three Kingdoms can understand through the general's biography, and visit the generals they want to keep more, which is the work of the lord.Generals with a friendship of 100 can be unlocked and played in the next round.Of course, the internal affairs system retains the necessary general and material transfer, personnel rewards and exile, etc.And using strategies to destroy the enemy's city or reduce the general's loyalty (you can dig corners or let the enemy's governor stand by himself, and the wise can be addition, each city has different facilities, each of which will trigger specific events, such as treasure trading, special troop formation, private soldier formation... or even stargazing divination.

Finally, it is the adventure layer of the game, which is also a major highlight of this game.First, different generals will be encountered on the big map, which can expand the protagonist's social circle.At the beginning of the game, it is common for the protagonist to be rejected when visiting generals with great differences in phase or reputation.You can imagine the scene in the Three Kingdoms through the novel, when the unknown protagonist visits Yuan Shao in Nanpi...Therefore, it is very important to expand the social circle through channels such as taverns and city adventures.You will encounter immortals such as Zuo Ci on the big map, and after accepting the trial, you will gain special skills or talismans, which can play a great role in the addition, there are various exploration events for players to taste in the city's taverns and other facilities, as well as in the wild exploration, such as suppressing bandits and discovering treasures.The treasures in the Romance of the Three Kingdoms also make an appearance one after another, such as the Red Hare horse, a pair of male and female swords, which can improve the general's attributes and skills.Different general events may also be triggered in the city, and the choices made will affect the goodwill between the protagonist and the different generals in the city.
